tool.description: Rank genes according to contributions to PCs.

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc @CMD_set_figure_params @CMD_read_inputs
sc.pl.pca_loadings( adata = '$adata', components = '$components', show = '$show', save = '$save',)

param.name: components
param.label: components
param.help: For example, ``'1,2,3'`` means ``[1, 2, 3]``, first, second, third principal component.

param.name: show
param.label: show
param.help: Show the plot, do not return axis.

param.name: save
param.label: save
param.help: If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}.

tool.help:
Rank genes according to contributions to PCs.
Parameters ---------- adata : :class:`~anndata.AnnData` Annotated data matrix. components : str or list of integers, optional For example, ``'1,2,3'`` means ``[1, 2, 3]``, first, second, third principal component. show : bool, optional (default: `None`) Show the plot, do not return axis. save : `bool` or `str`, optional (default: `None`) If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}.
